nodes.text: Ferton was an astronomical object located in the Ferton system of the Al'Nasrl sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. At some point by the time of the Galactic Civil War, Harbon, a sergeant with a mercenary company, visited Ferton. The sergeant later told of the visit to another member of the company.

Ferton was first mentioned in the 1987 rulebook for the first edition of West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Ferton system, and therefore the celestial body Ferton, within grid square T-13.
